name: SomfyProtectSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, disarm my home.”
”Alexa, arm my home.”
”Alexa, arm my home in night mode.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Thanks to the Somfy Protect Skill, you are now able to control your Somfy One, Somfy Home Alarm, Somfy Home Alarm Advanced and Somfy Home Alarm Essential using your voice. 

With the skill you can: 
- arm and disarm the alarm,
- enable and disable the night mode

Everything is secured with the passcode that you set.

You will need the Somfy Protect mobile app with an account already set up to use this skill.
